title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 70.4 - Rating
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 70.4 - Rating

State Regulations

Rates for no-consent and consent policies shall be subject to article 8 of the Insurance Law, giving due consideration to reflect actual and projected loss experience under the various options afforded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
70.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
